attributes.action: hold a referendum on whether the United Kingdom should ratify the Lisbon treaty for the extension of EU powers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ireland has rejected the treaty and our Foreign Secretary has stated that there should be 'a British view'. There is already a well established  British view that regardless of the opinions of HMG on the merits or demerits of this treaty (which all independent advice and statements by other EU 'leaders' confirm replicates the failed constituion in all but name) there should be a referendum that HMG will accept as bindng to establish whether this transfer of further power to Brussels is acceptable to the British people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
